title: Teen Texting Is As Compulsive As Gambling
text:
Teen Texting Is As Compulsive As Gambling 
Published By: Digg.com - Today 
The study of more than 400 eighth and 11th graders found that many teenage texters had a lot in common with compulsive gamblers, including l...
